description:
Protecting systems, networks, and programs from digital attacks is nowadays a challenge, mostly when you’re speaking about the fintech world.
Attackers are getting more inventive and companies need to be more efficient to resist to cyberattacks.
In this session we’ll be discussing current and future challenges of security and you’re invited to join! 
A short conference taking place as part of ICPC World Finals, gathering national and international speakers to discuss the present and future of cybersecurity. 
Join the discussion and meet the ICPC community!
name: Cybersecurity - When data is money
